title: First Conjugation Verbs (Present System)
learning_objectives: Identify first conjugation verbs by their infinitive ending (-āre)
Conjugate first conjugation verbs in present, imperfect, and future tenses
Explain the function of personal endings (-ō, -s, -t, -mus, -tis, -nt)
Distinguish between present, imperfect, and future time
Translate sentences using first conjugation verbs with first declension nouns
grammar_notes: Present system uses the present stem (found by dropping -re from infinitive)
Personal endings are consistent across present, imperfect, and future
Future tense uses -bi-/-bu- tense sign (with variations)
First conjugation is the most regular and predictable pattern
